hanzi-su-wiki:
猶

Значения

Ещё, всё ещё; мешкать

Мнемоника

Опасаться собак 犭 уважаемого человека 酋, ещё более свирепых, чем обычные сторожевые псы.

Варианты

犹

будто; (как; как только; Все еще; пока что

heisig_chinese_memo: People who drink horned whiskey act just like wild dogs. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: furthermore, waver, pack of wild dogs, chieftain, Molotov cocktail, animal horns, whiskey bottle
heisig_story: Wild dogs . . . animal horns . . . whiskey bottle.
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Кроме того, до сих пор, пока
koohiiStory1: The waver for this kanji means to hesitate. I wavered before going into the bar with a bunch of horned wild dogs drinking whiskey straight out of the bottle.
koohiiStory2: I wavered when the pack of wild dogs was blocking the way, but then I drank some Red Bull and charged through. (thanks shakkun).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: An animal with horns is drinking our alcohol? Still?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: You keep checking outside to see if they have stopped, but they are still drinking. They haven't stopped yet.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The animal with horns that is still drinking your alcohol is no animal at all. It is actually one of the local youths (ゆう) dressed up like a horned animal so they can drink as long as they want and you'll be too scared to shoo them away.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You keep checking, but that youth is still drinking. Of course, you don't know they are a youth, so it's quite impressive an animal can drink this much.
Ru_Notes:
Также с этим кандзи по звучанию иногда пишется "еврей" (猶太ユダヤ).
Фонетик: 酉 (とり、ユウ знак петуха, 10-й знак китайского зодиака; радикал «сакэ»).

Ru_trainchinese: yóu: (графема) до сих пор, все еще; быть как, быть словно
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the dog (犭) is the chieftain's (酋), furthermore!
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My frankenpooch wants to be just like a pack of wild dogs he sees on TV.
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meanings of the words " Jue " and "猷" are "Monkey Monkey" and "Puppy" (Xu Shen) A inscriptions as " initiatives ", see " initiatives ." Mouyou, Yuru, Yuke, etc. are the false meaning of " Jew ".

Some people think that " Yue " (Monkey) is suspicious by nature, and " And " is also a suspicious beast, so "Yue and" means hesitating (Kong Yingda). Wang Niansun pointed out that "hesitation", "Ronghe", "Yiyou", "skeptical", and "hesitating" all turn at once. They are two-tone double-tone words whose pronunciation reflects their meaning and should not be interpreted according to the shape of the word. Therefore, Kong Yingda, Yan Shigu's explanation of "hesitation" is not credible.

"Shuowen": "Yu (you), the genus Yun. From the dog, the chief voice. One said: Longxi said that the dog is a you."
humanum_short_description_en: The original meaning of the words " Jue " and "猷" is a monkey, or a puppy (Xu Shen). Mouyou, Yuru, Yuke, etc. are the false meaning of " Jew ".
humanum_full_description:
「猶」、「猷」本一字，本義是獮猴，一說是小狗(許慎)。甲金文作「猷」，參見「猷」。謀猷、猶如、猶可等是「猶」的假借義。

　　有人認為「猶」(獮猴)的本性多疑，而「與」也是一種多疑的野獸，故以「猶與」表示遲疑不決(孔穎達)。王念孫指出「猶豫」、「容與」、「夷猶」、「狐疑」、「躊躇」皆一聲之轉，是雙聲聯綿詞，其讀音體現其意義，不應據字形解釋字義，所以孔穎達、顏師古對「猶豫」的解釋不可信。

　　《說文》：「猶(猷)，玃屬。从犬，酋聲。一曰：隴西謂犬子爲猷。」
humanum_short_description: 「猶」、「猷」本一字，本義是獮猴，一說是小狗(許慎)。謀猷、猶如、猶可等是「猶」的假借義。

「 猶 」、「 猷 」本一字，本義是獮猴，一說是小狗(許慎)。甲金文作「 猷 」，參見「 猷 」。謀猷、猶如、猶可等是「 猶 」的假借義。 有人認為「 猶 」(獮猴)的本性多疑，而「 與 」也是一種多疑的野獸，故以「猶與」表示遲疑不決(孔穎達)。王念孫指出「猶豫」、「容與」、「夷猶」、「狐疑」、「躊躇」皆一聲之轉，是雙聲聯綿詞，其讀音體現其意義，不應據字形解釋字義，所以孔穎達、顏師古對「猶豫」的解釋不可信。 《說文》：「猶(猷)，玃屬。从犬，酋聲。一曰：隴西謂犬子爲猷。」
The original meanings of the words " Jue" and " 猷" are "Monkey Monkey" and "Puppy" (Xu Shen) A inscriptions as " initiatives", see " initiatives." Mouyou, Yuru, Yuke, etc. are the false meaning of " Jew". Some people think that " Yue" (Monkey) is suspicious by nature, and " And" is also a suspicious beast, so "Yue and" means hesitating (Kong Yingda). Wang Niansun pointed out that "hesitation", "Ronghe", "Yiyou", "skeptical", and "hesitating" all turn at once. They are two-tone double-tone words whose pronunciation reflects their meaning and should not be interpreted according to the shape of the word. Therefore, Kong Yingda, Yan Shigu's explanation of "hesitation" is not credible. "Shuowen": "Yu (you), the genus Yun. From the dog, the chief voice. One said: Longxi said that the dog is a you."

yóu

猶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yóu］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
［《廣韻》居祐切，去宥，見。］
［《廣韻》余救切，去宥，以。］
(1)兽名。猴类。亦称犹猢，似猴而足短，好登岩树。
(2)如同；好比。
(3)图画；描画。
(4)踌躇疑惧貌。
(5)舒迟貌。参见“猶然”。
(6)笑貌。参见“猶然”。
(7)可；可能。
(8)欺诈。
(9)见“猶豫”。
(10)副词。还；仍。
(11)副词。均；同样。
(12)副词。太；过。
(13)副词。则；却。
(14)副词。只；独。
(15)副词。已；已经。
(16)副词。亦；也。
(17)连词。尚且。
(18)连词。若；如果。
(19)通“猷”。谋，规划。
(20)通“猷”。道；道路。
(21)通“猷”。顺，沿着。
(22)通“訧”。责怪。
(23)通“由”。行；做。
(24)通“由”。从。
(25)通“由”。由于。
(26)通“欲”。要。
(27)通“蕕”。臭草。借指恶臭。

猶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猶； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页715第20
【唐韻】以周切【集韻】【韻會】夷周切，?音由。【說文】玃屬。从犬，酋聲。【集韻】居山中，聞人聲豫登木，無人乃下。世謂不決曰猶豫。或作?。【爾雅·釋獸】猶如麂，善登木。【註】健上樹。【禮·曲禮】所以使民決嫌疑，定猶與也。【疏】猶與，二獸，皆進退多疑。人多疑惑者似之，故謂之猶與。【淮南子·兵略訓】擊其猶猶，凌其與與。　又【說文】隴西謂犬子爲猶。　又【廣韻】似也。【詩·召南】寔命不猶。【傳】猶，若也。又【小雅】淑人君子，其德不猶。【禮·喪服】兄弟之子猶子也。　又【集韻】可止之辭也。【詩·魏風】上愼旃哉，猶來無止。【傳】猶，可也。　又本作猷。【詩·小雅】克壯其猶。【傳】猶，道也。【箋】猶，謀也，兵謀也。【疏】能光大其運謀之道。【又】謀猶回遹。【箋】謀爲政之道。又【大雅】王猶允塞。【箋】猶，謀也。　又【廣韻】尚也。【禮·檀弓】仲子亦猶行古之道也。　又【詩·周頌】嶞山喬嶽，允猶翕河。【箋】猶，圖也。小山及高嶽，皆信按山川之圖而次序祭之。　又夷猶。【禮·檀弓】

["Guangyun" cuts with Zhou, Pingyou, with. ]
["Guangyun" Ju Youqie, go to You, see you. ]
["Guang Yun" Yu Jiuqie, go to You, to. ]
(1) The animal name. Monkeys. Also known as Yuhuo, like a monkey but short feet, it is easy to climb the rock tree.
(2) Like; like.
(3) Picture; drawing.
(4) Hesitation and fear of appearance.
(5) Shu Chi appearance. See "Yueran".
(6) Smiling appearance. See "Yueran".
(7) Yes; possible.
(8) Fraud.
(9) See "Hesitation".
(10) Adverbs. Still.
(11) Adverbs. Both; the same.
(12) Adverbs. Too; too.
(13) Adverbs. Then; however.
(14) Adverbs. Only; alone.
(15) Adverbs. Already; Already.
(16) Adverbs. Also; also.
(17) Conjunctions. Still.
(18) Conjunctions. If; if.
(19) Through "you". Plan, plan.
(20) Link "you". Road; road.
(21) Link "you". Shun, go along.
(22) Through "訧". Blame.
(23) Through "you". OK; do.
(24) Through "you". From.
(25) Through "you". due to.
(26) Through "desire". want.
(27) Through "Xin". Smelly grass. Refers to the stench.

Name meaning

yóu, yáo
вм. 犹
Radicals: 犭, 酉  (animal, alcohol, horns)
Meaning Mnemonic
An animal with horns is drinking our alcohol? Still?
You keep checking outside to see if they have stopped, but they are still drinking. They haven't stopped yet.
Reading Mnemonic
The animal with horns that is still drinking your alcohol is no animal at all. It is actually one of the local youths (ゆう) dressed up like a horned animal so they can drink as long as they want and you'll be too scared to shoo them away.
You keep checking, but that youth is still drinking. Of course, you don't know they are a youth, so it's quite impressive an animal can drink this much.
